title: Clean Sweep: Lorena Wiebes Wins all Three Stages at RideLondon Classique
content:
The SD Worx-Protime sprinter won all three stages as well as the overall title and points competition in complete domination of the WorldTour race.

Read the full article at Clean Sweep: Lorena Wiebes Wins all Three Stages at RideLondon Classique on Velo.
author: ahood
